Reviews.Title: “Great Breakfast, Good Price, and Close to the U Bahn”
Reviews.Author: vtely
Reviews.Content: picked hotel based tripadvisor reviews yes hotel comfortable convenient ubahn station yes plenty shops food nearby prepared carry luggage 3 flights stairs elevator consider hotel located relation city center overall hotel comfortable stay value wed recommend wasnt hotel stayed berlin amy

Reviews.Title: “First time, but not the last time.”
Reviews.Author: pkr6000
Reviews.Content: nice pleasant family hotel helpfull staff excellent value money excellent breakfast hotel spandau outskirts berlin assures nice quet sleep night traffic ubahn directly outside hotel numerous restaurants cafes reasonable prices 100 meteres walking distance car parking cheap paid 5 euro afternoon til sunday afternoon car buy travellers card save lot money trouble bahn fast trouble stairs lower floors stairs maybe hotel complaints none missed

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Lindenufer
HotelInfo.Address: Breite Strasse 36, 13597 Berlin, Germany
